Query.SQL: SELECT E.DsIndexMnem,E.Region,E.IndexDesc,D.* FROM DS2EQUITYINDEX E JOIN DS2INDEXDATA D ON E.DSINDEXCODE = D.DSINDEXCODE WHERE E.DSIndexMnem = '%INDEX_MNEMONIC%' AND VALUEDATE BETWEEN '%START_DATE%' AND '%END_DATE%' ORDER BY VALUEDATE
Query.Description: Pull a (non-Thomson Reuters) index series, using DsIndexMnem.
